description:
The year is 2977. mankind has become complacent and stagnant. All work is done by machines, while humans spend all their time on entertainment. But when a mysterious invader from the stars catches Earth unawares, only the legendary space pirate Captain Harlock and the crew of the Arcadia have the will to stand against them.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
2977 A.D. Mankind has developed the technology to head into space.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le drapeau pirate flottant dans l`espace
The Jolly Roger That Flutters Through Space
宇宙にはためく海賊旗

REGULAR.description:
A transport ship unit is attacked by an unidentified flying object as it exits Planet No.7.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 未知からのメッセージ

REGULAR.description:
The town is sent into panic by the sphere that landed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Woman Who Burns Like Paper
Kami no You ni Moeru Onna
La femme qui brulait comme du papier
Una donna che brucia come carta

REGULAR.description:
After being invited to be a pirate by Harlock, Tadashi exits the Arcadia.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jiyuu no Hata no Moto ni!
Sous la bannière de la liberté

REGULAR.description:
Harlock tells Tadashi, upon joining his crew, to “just loiter around and enjoy it,” leaving Tadashi confused.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bis zu den Grenzen des Alls
To the Shores of Distant Stars?

REGULAR.description:
The Mazone soldier mentioned the name Queen Lafresia as she blew herself up.
Source: crunchyroll

Upon seeing an odd looking formation from space, Harlock’s crew heads to the Bermuda area.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La piramide in fondo al mare
The Pyramid on the Ocean Floor

REGULAR.description:
There are signals being emitted from the pennant and the pyramid.
Source: crunchyroll

Dr. Zero analyzes the hair from the captured Mazone and sees their make-up is identical to sap found in plant life surrounding ancient ruins.
Source: crunchyroll

Believing that all the jungles of Earth are inhabited by the Mazone, Harlock decides to return to the Pirate Island again.
Source: crunchyroll

The Arcadia successfully makes its way to Venus.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lola ga Konjiki ni Kagayaku Toki
ローラが金色に輝く時

REGULAR.description:
Tadashi is upset at himself for talking about the Arcadia to Lola.
Source: crunchyroll

The Arcadia heads back to Earth to investigate a third signal being emitted from the Sargasso Sea.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Castle of Evil in the Sea of Death

REGULAR.description:
Commander Kiruta takes Mayu with him. Desperate to find her, Harlock receives a message from Commander Kiruta.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La lapide ai piedi della sfinge

REGULAR.description:
The Arcadia is at the north pole after spotting an aurora that closely resembles a runway.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tragic Love! The Northern Pole Aurora
悲恋! 北極オーロラ

REGULAR.description:
The operator, Kei Yuki, goes to visit her parents’ grave.
Source: crunchyroll

Upon finding a message in a bottle floating in space that contains an SOS message from Captain Yamanaka of the Braves ship, the Arcadia sets off for the Horsehead Nebula.
Source: crunchyroll

A group of Mazone suddenly appear in the ship.
Source: crunchyroll

There are supposed to be forty-two crewman aboard the Arcadia.
Source: crunchyroll

Miime’s old planet is named Jura, and it was once devastated by a nuclear attack.
Source: crunchyroll

An asteroid belt hits the Arcadia.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゴーラム! 悲劇の戦士

REGULAR.description:
Upon returning to Deathshadow Island with the memory device left behind by Zol, Harlock and his crew learn something huge about Queen Lafresia’s flagship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 宇宙の墓場デスシャドウ

REGULAR.description:
Upon victory, Harlock orders First mate Yattaran to secure the hostages.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yattaran, Song of a Plastic Model Fanatic
ヤッタラン・プラモ狂の唄

REGULAR.description:
A surprising couple, Zorba, the son of the warrior Zol, and a Mazone medic named Lucia, escaped from the Mazone fleet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Shooting Star of Pure Love

REGULAR.description:
Doctor Zero becomes extremely resentful over Zorba and Lucia’s murder.
Source: crunchyroll

Due to Harlock’s unrelenting resistance, there is a growing resentment between the Mazone military and its civilians.
Source: crunchyroll

Having a hunch as to the reason why Harlock so staunchly opposes them, Queen Lafresia sends someone on a mission to Earth to find out why.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アルカディア号の意志

REGULAR.description:
In order to rescue Mayu, Harlock allows the will of the ship to choose its own course.
Source: crunchyroll

The Mazone come attacking the Arcadia which has had too much free time lately.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La bataille de la planète de l`arc-en-ciel
The Life-and-Death Struggle on the Rainbow Planet

REGULAR.description:
While the Arcadia is being repaired at the dock of a Pirate Island, Tadashi and Tori-san come back with a pair of glasses.
Source: crunchyroll

The Arcadia is rapidly being repaired on a Pirate Island while Lafresia continues her bloodthirsty hunt for it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arcadia: The Secret Story of Its Construction
アルカディア号建造秘話

REGULAR.description:
The Mazone plot to use Mayu to lure Harlock and the Arcadia to the Wind Planet and then attack with a powerful mine.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le piège de la planète des tempêtes
The Call of the Star Flute

REGULAR.description:
Commander Kiruta learns of the existence of the Mazone and persistently tries to inform the Prime Minister of the impending doom.
Source: crunchyroll

The Arcadia is trapped due to an artificial gravity device.
Source: crunchyroll

After rescuing Mayu, all that remains is the final showdown with Lafresia.
Source: crunchyroll

The beautiful, dazzling Shizuka Namino becomes a bit of a celebrity on board the Arcadia after being rescued.
Source: crunchyroll

Upon realizing that Harlock knew who Shizuka’s real identity is, she deems that she has failed in her mission.
Source: crunchyroll

The invasion Mazone forces finally begin their attack on Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

The Arcadia leaves for space with Kiruta on board, after he was injured while trying to save Mayu.
Source: crunchyroll

After a bunch of skirmishes, the true battle finally begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Et les anges se mirent à chanter

REGULAR.description:
Making its way past countless gunshots, the Arcadia finally arrives at Queen Lafresia’s flagship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ultime combat : Albator contre la reine
決闘! 女王対ハーロック

REGULAR.description:
Harlock and his crew go for their triumphant return to Earth, but, all that awaits them is an order that they’ve been banished from Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

PROMOTION.description: Starts with a front view of Harlock`s ship, then changes from one side and then goes to Harlock.

titles.title: Italian trailer version A for DVD publication
Italian trailer version B for DVD publication

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 宇宙海賊キャプテンハーロック

titles.title: Die Abenteuer des fantastischen Weltraumpiraten Captain Harlock
宇宙海賊・キャプテンハーロック
Capitaine Albator, le pirate de l`espace
